```{r}

```{r}
arr <- c(10, 20, 30, 40, 50)
cat("Element at index 3:", arr[3], "\n")  # R uses 1-basedÂ indexing
```

```{r}
arr <- seq(10, 50, by = 10)
cat("Elements from index 2 to 4:", arr[2:4],"\n")
```

```{r}
arr <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
new_arr <- arr[arr > 3]
cat("Elements greater than 3:",new_arr,"\n")
```

```{r}
a <- c(1, 2, 3)
b <- c(4, 5, 6)
sum_arr <- a + b
cat("Element-wise sum:",sum_arr,"\n")
```
